name: A Landlord's Dream
description:
Abel Lowen, a Stringshaper, gets woke up by his apartment's alarm clock in the middle of the night. When he'll finally get up, late for his band's rehearsal, he will find out that almost nothing seems to be working properly.

What's happening? Are others experiencing the same problems? Why is his neighbour hallucinating in the middle of the hallway?

HOW TO PLAY

  • LEFT CLICK - Interact, skip dialogue line
  • RIGHT CLICK - Examine
  • F5 - Save Game
  • F6 - Load Game

Game developed in for Monthly Adventure Game Studio competition in January 2015. Nominated for Best Music and Sound in the AGS Awards 2015

LostTrainDude: Design, Coding, Music
Kastchey: Art, Design
CaptainD: Brainstorming Help, SFX, Proofreading

Maximiliano Vaccaro: Spanish Translation
